entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Lawrence

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
